title: harassment
body: i was just wondering what would happen to someone who threatened to kill me and my family and blow up my house along with cutting my head off and posting it?

replies.body: What would happen to them? They'd probably go to bed, wake up the next day and continue on with their life... which is the same thing you would do if you got threatened online.
Probably nothing, but try a ticket. I have sent tickets regarding these types of things in and the offenders are still playing. Dont want to crush your hopes just trying to be real.

- You can report the post for harassment
- You can take a screenshot and send it in a ticket to Riot Support

That's about it. Internet harassment is not uncommon, and is generally harmless outside of the actual post. No one is actually going to do anything unless they have some unexplained reason or rage to do so and someone gets personal information.

You send a ticket to riot and they will more than likely get banned instantly.


But that's just what i've seen in experience, so idk for sure.


Just send in a ticket though.
